author: Sam Ross
description: Elderflower liqueur replaces aromatised wine in this riff on a classic Corpse Reviver No.2. This means the bitter oils from the lemon zest twist are crucial to the balance of this aromatic floral and citrusy cocktail.
name: Sunflower

recipeInstructions.text: RINSE chilled glass with absinthe and set to one side
SHAKE other ingredients with ice and fine strain into absinthe-rinsed glass
